BlockPos(x, (int) Math.ceil(y - 1), z);&#10;BlockState stepped = world.getBlockState(steppedPos);</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">Block replacePair[][] = {&#10;	{Blocks.WATER, Blocks.FROSTED_ICE},&#10;	{Blocks.LAVA, Blocks.MAGMA_BLOCK}&#10;};</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">for (int i = 0; i < replacePair.length; i++)&#10;	if (stepped.getBlock() == replacePair[i][0]) {&#10;		BlockState newBlock = replacePair[i][1].defaultBlockState();&#10;		for (Map.Entry<Property<?>, Comparable<?>> entry : stepped.getValues().entrySet()) {&#10;			Property property = newBlock.getBlock().getStateDefinition().getProperty(entry.getKey().getName());&#10;			if (property != null && newBlock.getValue(property) != null)&#10;				try {&#10;					newBlock = newBlock.setValue(property, (Comparable) entry.getValue());&#10;				} catch (Exception e) {&#10;				}&#10;		}&#10;		world.setBlock(steppedPos, newBlock, 3);&#10;		break;&#10;	}</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
